headlines.description: Chelsea went second in the Premier League with an emphatic 4-0 win at Burnley on Sunday which maintained their unbeaten start to the season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Barkley stars as Chelsea cruise vs. Burnley

headlines.description: Two Luka Milivojevic penalties either side of Granit Xhaka and Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang goals meant the points were shared at Selhurst Park.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal's winning run ends with draw at Palace

headlines.description: Defeat to Juventus on Tuesday and a draw with Chelsea last Saturday saw pressure mounting again on Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho.
headlines.shortLinkText: United return to winning ways against Everton
